privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At NomadMee, your privacy is of paramount importance to us. This Privacy Policy document outlines the types of personal information that is received and collected by NomadMee and how we use it.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.description: We collect various types of information in order to provide and improve our services:

item1.title: Personal Information
item1.description: This may include your name, email address, phone number, etc., that you voluntarily provide when registering on our platform or contacting us.

item2.title: Usage Data
item2.description: This may include information such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system, collected automatically when you access our platform.

item3.title: Cookies
item3.description: We use cookies to personalize your experience, track usage patterns, and improve our website's functionality.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.description: The information we collect is used for various purposes:
section2.item1: To provide and maintain our services
section2.item2: To notify you about changes to our services
section2.item3: To improve our website and services based on user feedback
section2.item4: To provide customer support and communication

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing and Disclosure
section3.description: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties except in the following circumstances:

item1.title: With service providers
item1.description: We may share your data with trusted third-party providers who help us operate our platform.

item2.title: For legal reasons
item2.description: If required by law, we may disclose your information to comply with legal obligations or to protect our rights.

item3.title: Business transfers
item3.description: If we undergo a business merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your information may be transferred as part of that process.

section4.title: 4. Your Data Protection Rights
section4.description: Depending on your location, you may have certain data protection rights under applicable laws.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.description: We take the security of your personal data seriously. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section6.description: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will notify you of any significant changes.

section7.title: 7. Contact Us
section7.description: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy or our practices, feel free to contact us.
